question: What common themes arise in the leadership excerpts of companies that have engaged in strategic partnerships with cloud service vendors?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that have engaged in strategic partnerships with cloud service vendors. [CompanyITPartnerDetail]
Extract leadership excerpts from the identified companies. [CompanyLeadershipExcerpt]
